mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN t_borrow_channel_dtl t1 ON t.channelDetail = t1.detailCode LEFT JOIN t_borrow_team t2 ON t1.teamNo = t2.teamNo
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelDetail, t.pageReferer, CONCAT(t2.teamNo,'-',t1.advertisers,'-',t1.channelName) as 'channelName', COUNT(t.applyId) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.applyType=1 OR t.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount', ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT allotCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END)/COUNT(t.applyId)*100,2) as 'netCityProp', ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT callCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END)/COUNT(t.applyId)*100,2) as 'callCityProp', ROUND((COUNT(t.applyId)-COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT allotCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END)-COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT callCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END))/COUNT(t.applyId)*100,2) as 'otherCityProp', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=0 AND t.loanAmount<=1 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>1 AND t.loanAmount<3 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=3 AND t.loanAmount<5 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=5 AND t.loanAmount<10 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount4', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=10 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount5', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=0 THEN 1 END) as 'noAssetCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=1 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=2 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=3 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=4 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount4' FROM ( SELECT n.applyId, n.channelCode, n.channelDetail, n.pageReferer, IFNULL(n1.cityName,n.cityName) as 'cityName', IFNULL(n1.loanAmount,0) as 'loanAmount', n.applyType, (IF(n1.houseType !='' AND n1.houseType!=0 AND n1.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n1.carType !='' AND n1.carType!=0 AND n1.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n3.insurType !='' AND n3.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n2.wagesType=1,1,IF(n1.socialType=1 AND n1.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel' FROM t_borrow_apply n LEFT JOIN t_borrow_base n1 ON n.applyId = n1.applyId LEFT JOIN t_borrow_income n2 ON n.applyId = n2.applyId LEFT JOIN t_borrow_insure n3 ON n.applyId = n3.applyId
WHERE ) as t
GROUP BY t.channelDetail ) t ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelDetail, t.pageReferer, CONCAT(t2.teamNo,'-',t1.advertisers,'-',t1.channelName) as 'channelName', t.applyCount as 'applyCount', t.seniorCount as 'seniorCount', t3.assetCount1 as 'assetCount1', t3.assetCount2 as 'assetCount2', t3.assetCount3 as 'assetCount3', t3.assetCount4 as 'assetCount4', t3.assetCount5 as 'assetCount5' FROM ( SELECT n.channelDetail, n.channelCode, n.pageReferer, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_borrow_apply n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tmp2.channelDetail, MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 1 THEN tmp2.assetCount ELSE '0-0-0-0-0' END ) 'assetCount1', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 2 THEN tmp2.assetCount ELSE '0-0-0-0-0' END ) 'assetCount2', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 3 THEN tmp2.assetCount ELSE '0-0-0-0-0' END ) 'assetCount3', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 4 THEN tmp2.assetCount ELSE '0-0-0-0-0' END ) 'assetCount4', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 5 THEN tmp2.assetCount ELSE '0-0-0-0-0' END ) 'assetCount5' FROM ( SELECT tmp1.channelDetail, tmp1.amountLevel, CONCAT_WS('-', IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=0 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=1 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=2 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=3 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=4 THEN 1 END),0) ) as 'assetCount' FROM ( SELECT n.channelDetail, (CASE WHEN IFNULL(n1.loanAmount,0)>0 AND IFNULL(n1.loanAmount,0)<=1 THEN 1 WHEN n1.loanAmount>1 AND n1.loanAmount<3 THEN 2 WHEN n1.loanAmount>=3 AND n1.loanAmount<5 THEN 3 WHEN n1.loanAmount>=5 AND n1.loanAmount<10 THEN 4 WHEN n1.loanAmount>=10 THEN 5 ELSE 0 END) as 'amountLevel', (IF(n1.houseType !='' AND n1.houseType!=0 AND n1.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n1.carType !='' AND n1.carType!=0 AND n1.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n3.insurType !='' AND n3.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n2.wagesType=1,1,IF(n1.socialType=1 AND n1.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel'
FROM t_borrow_apply n LEFT JOIN t_borrow_base n1 ON n.applyId = n1.applyId LEFT JOIN t_borrow_income n2 ON n.applyId = n2.applyId LEFT JOIN t_borrow_insure n3 ON n.applyId = n3.applyId WHERE ) as tmp1 GROUP BY tmp1.channelDetail,tmp1.amountLevel )as tmp2 GROUP BY tmp2.channelDetail
) as t3 ON t3.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelDetail, t.pageReferer, CONCAT(t2.teamNo,'-',t1.advertisers,'-',t1.channelName) as 'channelName', t.applyCount as 'applyCount', IFNULL( t.seniorCount,0) as 'seniorCount', IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount,0) as 'netStoreCount', IFNULL(t4.saleCount,0) as 'saleCount', IFNULL(t44.sucSaleCount-IFNULL(t45.failSaleCount,0),0) as 'sucSaleCount', IFNULL(ROUND(t44.sucSaleAmt-IFNULL(t45.failSaleAmt,0),2),0) as 'sucSaleAmt', IFNULL(t5.bxCount,0) as 'bxCount', IFNULL(t5.sucBxCount,0) as 'sucBxCount' FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.pageReferer, n.channelDetail, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_borrow_apply n WHERE
GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(n.applyId) as 'netStoreCount',n.channelDetail, DATE_FORMAT(n.applyTime,#{datePattern}) as 'recordDate' FROM t_borrow_store_apply n JOIN t_org n1 ON n.orgId = n1.orgId AND n1.isNet=1 WHERE AND n.orgId !='' GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t3 ON t3.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(DISTINCT n.applyId) as 'saleCount' FROM t_borrow_sel_count n WHERE AND n.handleType=1 GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t4 ON t4.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
LEFT JOIN( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(DISTINCT n.applyId) as 'sucSaleCount', SUM(n.costPrice*n.discount)/100 as 'sucSaleAmt' FROM t_borrow_sel_count n WHERE AND n.handleType=2 GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t44 ON t44.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
LEFT JOIN( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(DISTINCT n.applyId) as 'failSaleCount', SUM(n.costPrice*n.discount)/100 as 'failSaleAmt' FROM t_borrow_sel_count n WHERE AND n.handleType=4 GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t45 ON t45.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
LEFT JOIN( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(CASE WHEN n.`status`!=0 THEN 1 END) as 'bxCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.`status`=1 THEN 1 END) as 'sucBxCount' FROM t_borrow_apply_push n WHERE
AND n.pushType in(select pushCode from t_borrow_push_cfg where `type`=1) GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t5 ON t5.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelDetail, CONCAT(t2.teamNo,'-',t1.advertisers,'-',t1.channelName) as 'channelName', t.applyCount as 'applyCount', IFNULL( t.seniorCount,0) as 'seniorCount', IFNULL( t3.netStoreCount,0) as 'netStoreCount', IFNULL( t3.dealStoreCount,0) as 'dealStoreCount', IFNULL( t3.invalidCount,0) as 'invalidCount', IFNULL( t7.3dayCallCount,0) as '3dayCallCount', IFNULL( t3.useCount,0) as 'useCount', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(IFNULL(t3.useCount, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1),0) * 100),2),'%') AS 'useUv', IFNULL( t3.labelCount0,0) as 'labelCount0', IFNULL( t3.labelCount1,0) as 'labelCount1', IFNULL( t3.labelCount2,0) as 'labelCount2', IFNULL( t3.labelCount3,0) as 'labelCount3', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount3, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate3', IFNULL(t3.labelCount4, 0) AS 'labelCount4', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount4, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate4', IFNULL(t3.labelCount5, 0) AS 'labelCount5', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount5, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate5', IFNULL( t4.sucBookCount,0) as 'sucBookCount', IFNULL( t5.totalSignCount,0) as 'totalSignCount', IFNULL( t6.sucRetCount,0) as 'sucRetCount', t.pageReferer, ROUND(IFNULL(t6.sucRetAmount,0),2) as 'sucRetAmount' FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.channelDetail, n.pageReferer, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_borrow_apply n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'netStoreCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.orderStatus !=-1 OR n.orderType =2 THEN 1 END) as 'dealStoreCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.orderStatus =8 THEN 1 END) as 'invalidCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel>=3 THEN 1 END) as 'useCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=0 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount0', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=1 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=2 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=3 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=4 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount4', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=5 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount5' FROM t_borrow_store_apply n JOIN t_org n1 ON n.orgId = n1.orgId AND n1.isNet=1
WHERE AND n.orgId !='' GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t3 ON t3.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(DISTINCT m.applyId) as 'sucBookCount' FROM t_treat_book m JOIN t_borrow_apply n ON n.applyId = m.applyId WHERE AND m.`status`=3 GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t4 ON t4.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(DISTINCT n.applyId) as 'totalSignCount' FROM t_treat_info_history n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t5 ON t5.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(n.recordId) as 'sucRetCount' , IFNULL(SUM(n.feeAmount),0) AS 'sucRetAmount' FROM t_treat_success_history n WHERE AND n.`status`= 2 GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t6 ON t6.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(1) as '3dayCallCount' FROM t_store_call_recent m JOIN t_borrow_apply n ON n.applyId = m.applyId WHERE
AND m.recentStatus=1 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, n.applyTime,m.firstTime)<=3
GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t7 ON t7.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelCode, t.channelDetail, t.pageReferer, t1.channelName as 'channelName', COUNT(1) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.applyType=1 OR t.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount', ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT allotCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END)/COUNT(1)*100,2) as 'netCityProp', ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT callCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END)/COUNT(1)*100,2) as 'callCityProp', ROUND( (COUNT(1)-COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT allotCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END) -COUNT(CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(t.cityName,(SELECT callCitys FROM t_base_cfg))THEN 1 END))/COUNT(1)*100 ,2 ) as 'otherCityProp', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=0 AND t.loanAmount<=1 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>1 AND t.loanAmount<3 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=3 AND t.loanAmount<5 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=5 AND t.loanAmount<10 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount4', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.loanAmount>=10 THEN 1 END) as 'amtCount5', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=0 THEN 1 END) as 'noAssetCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=1 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=2 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=3 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.assetLevel=4 THEN 1 END) as 'assetCount4'
FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.channelDetail, n.pageReferer, n.cityName as 'cityName', IFNULL(n.applyAmount,0) as 'loanAmount', n.applyType, (IF(n.houseType !='' AND n.houseType!=0 AND n.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.carType !='' AND n.carType!=0 AND n.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.insurType !='' AND n.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n.wagesType=1,1,IF(n.socialType=1 AND n.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel'
FROM t_apply n WHERE
UNION ALL SELECT n.sourceChannel as 'channelCode', n.channelDetail, 'thirdData' as 'pageReferer', n.cityName as 'cityName', IFNULL(n.loanAmount,0) as 'loanAmount', n.applyType, (IF(n.houseType !='' AND n.houseType!=0 AND n.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.carType !='' AND n.carType!=0 AND n.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.insurType !='' AND n.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n.wagesType=1,1,IF(n.socialType=1 AND n.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel' FROM t_third_data n WHERE
) as t
GROUP BY t.channelDetail ) t ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelCode, t.channelDetail, t1.channelName as 'channelName', t.applyCount as 'applyCount', t.seniorCount 'seniorCount', t.pageReferer, IFNULL(t3.assetCount1,'0-0-0-0-0') as 'assetCount1', IFNULL(t3.assetCount2,'0-0-0-0-0') as 'assetCount2', IFNULL(t3.assetCount3,'0-0-0-0-0') as 'assetCount3', IFNULL(t3.assetCount4,'0-0-0-0-0') as 'assetCount4', IFNULL(t3.assetCount5,'0-0-0-0-0') as 'assetCount5' FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.pageReferer, n.channelDetail, COUNT(1) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_apply n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail UNION ALL SELECT n.sourceChannel as 'channelCode', 'thridData' as 'pageReferer', n.channelDetail, COUNT(1) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_third_data n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail
) t
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tmp2.channelCode, tmp2.channelDetail, MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 1 THEN tmp2.assetCount END ) 'assetCount1', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 2 THEN tmp2.assetCount END ) 'assetCount2', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 3 THEN tmp2.assetCount END ) 'assetCount3', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 4 THEN tmp2.assetCount END ) 'assetCount4', MAX(CASE tmp2.amountLevel WHEN 5 THEN tmp2.assetCount END ) 'assetCount5' FROM ( SELECT tmp1.channelCode, tmp1.channelDetail, tmp1.amountLevel, CONCAT_WS('-', IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=0 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=1 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=2 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=3 THEN 1 END),0), IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN tmp1.assetLevel=4 THEN 1 END),0) ) as 'assetCount' FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.channelDetail, (CASE WHEN IFNULL(n.applyAmount,0)>0 AND IFNULL(n.applyAmount,0)<=1 THEN 1 WHEN n.applyAmount>1 AND n.applyAmount<3 THEN 2 WHEN n.applyAmount>=3 AND n.applyAmount<5 THEN 3 WHEN n.applyAmount>=5 AND n.applyAmount<10 THEN 4 WHEN n.applyAmount>=10 THEN 5 ELSE 0 END) as 'amountLevel', (IF(n.houseType !='' AND n.houseType!=0 AND n.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.carType !='' AND n.carType!=0 AND n.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.insurType !='' AND n.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n.wagesType=1,1,IF(n.socialType=1 AND n.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel'
FROM t_apply n WHERE UNION ALL SELECT n.sourceChannel as 'channelCode', n.channelDetail, (CASE WHEN IFNULL(n.loanAmount,0)>0 AND IFNULL(n.loanAmount,0)<=1 THEN 1 WHEN n.loanAmount>1 AND n.loanAmount<3 THEN 2 WHEN n.loanAmount>=3 AND n.loanAmount<5 THEN 3 WHEN n.loanAmount>=5 AND n.loanAmount<10 THEN 4 WHEN n.loanAmount>=10 THEN 5 ELSE 0 END) as 'amountLevel', (IF(n.houseType !='' AND n.houseType!=0 AND n.houseType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.carType !='' AND n.carType!=0 AND n.carType!=2,1,0)+ IF(n.insurType !='' AND n.insurType!=0 ,1,0)+ IF(n.wagesType=1,1,IF(n.socialType=1 AND n.fundType=1,1,0)) ) as 'assetLevel'
FROM t_third_data n WHERE ) as tmp1 GROUP BY tmp1.channelDetail,tmp1.amountLevel )as tmp2 GROUP BY tmp2.channelDetail
) as t3 ON t3.channelDetail = t.channelDetail
ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail

SELECT CONCAT_WS('至',#{startDateStr},#{endDateStr}) as 'recordDate', t.channelCode, t.channelDetail, t.pageReferer, t.applyCount as 'applyCount', IFNULL( t3.netStoreCount,0) as 'netStoreCount', IFNULL( t3.dealStoreCount,0) as 'dealStoreCount', IFNULL( t3.invalidCount,0) as 'invalidCount', IFNULL( t7.3dayCallCount,0) as '3dayCallCount', IFNULL( t3.useCount,0) as 'useCount', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(IFNULL(t3.useCount, 0) / IFNULL(t3.dealStoreCount, 1),0) * 100),2),'%') AS 'useUv', IFNULL( t3.labelCount0,0) as 'labelCount0', IFNULL( t3.labelCount1,0) as 'labelCount1', IFNULL( t3.labelCount2,0) as 'labelCount2', IFNULL( t3.labelCount3,0) as 'labelCount3', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount3, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate3', IFNULL(t3.labelCount4, 0) AS 'labelCount4', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount4, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate4', IFNULL(t3.labelCount5, 0) AS 'labelCount5', CONCAT(ROUND((IFNULL(t3.labelCount5, 0) / IFNULL(t3.netStoreCount, 1) * 100),2),'%') AS 'labelRate5' FROM ( SELECT n.channelCode, n.pageReferer, n.channelDetail, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'applyCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.applyType=1 OR n.applyType =6 THEN 1 END) as 'seniorCount' FROM t_borrow_apply n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) as t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(n.applyId) as 'netStoreCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.orderStatus !=-1 OR n.orderType =2 THEN 1 END) as 'dealStoreCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.orderStatus =8 THEN 1 END) as 'invalidCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel>=3 THEN 1 END) as 'useCount', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=0 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount0', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=1 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount1', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=2 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount2', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=3 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount3', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=4 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount4', COUNT(CASE WHEN n.custLabel=5 THEN 1 END) as 'labelCount5' FROM t_borrow_store_apply n JOIN t_org n1 ON n.orgId = n1.orgId AND n1.isNet=1
WHERE AND n.orgId !='' GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t3 ON t3.channelDetail = t.channelDetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.channelDetail, COUNT(1) as '3dayCallCount' FROM t_store_call_recent m JOIN t_borrow_apply n ON n.applyId = m.applyId WHERE
AND m.recentStatus=1 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, n.applyTime,m.firstTime)<=3
GROUP BY n.channelDetail ) t7 ON t7.channelDetail = t.channelDetail ORDER BY t.applyCount DESC,t.channelDetail
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_borrow_apply n WHERE GROUP BY n.channelDetail) as t
